properties.areaDesc: S of Currituck Beach Light NC to Oregon Inlet NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 29 at 3:47AM EST until March 1 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt,
becoming northwest after midnight and rough waters expected.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Duck to Oregon Inlet.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to noon EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST SUNDAY
